author: Sina Irvani
comment: In the MOST recent update the "Recent Form" in the team's Detail tab has faced troubles it only shows a blank page! Pleeease fix it ASAP! It was your apps BEST feature!!

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello there. We had some issues with our back-end servers during the Sunday afternoon. This issues have been fixed and all the information should be available now. Best regards

author: kevin tekin
comment: Those blinking ads are disgusting , their is a setting to remove ads but again you need me to deep into my pocket ,haven't i? supported you ,when i download the app

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello Kevin, thank you for your review. If you could send us the screenshot of the ads that bothers you, it would be helpful. Ads are published with official providers such as Google and Facebook, and we don't have much control on what they'll allow and what they won't. Best regards

author: Prince Asare
comment: Using Sofascore on Windows platform was great for me but using it now on Android is way better than great;it's magnificent. I don't believe there's a better sport app around. Keep up the good work!

author: Shubho Banerjee
comment: Excellent app. The only thing I would wish for is that the default view be the same as the one from the last use of the app. The default view is not the best for me because I want to see the scores of all my favourites all at once.

author: FAZIL SHAHBAZ
comment: I love this app and especially i get a lot of info about football. But the problem is i can't share the page screenshot as in previous versions. Now i have to manually take screenshots and send it to my friends. Can you fix this plz...😟

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your review. You can still share the screens from the app via built in screenshot option on your phone. It usually triggered by combination of "power + volume down". You can then share this screenshot via email or social networks. Dedicated share button still exists on "lineups" and "cup tree" screens. Best regards

author: Ayan Mondal
comment: I use Xiaomi Mi Mix 2 and my android version is 7.1.1 NMF26X and the problem is for the notification sounds. i cant change the notification sounds here as the options are locked and not highlighted. On my previous Android sets i had the option to select notification sound for football matches which was classified into 3 types  "match info" had a different notification sound.. There was a different sound for "scores" and a different sound for " half time" or "full time". Now all sports have same notification sound and its difficult to understand what is happening which previously i could understand just by listening to the notification sound that whether it was lineups notification or notification of a goal scored. Please fix this problem because besides this the app is awesome and i only use this app to follow football scores. Please get a fix soon.Release an update for this problem and introduce these options as they are for other android versions because the notification sounds really help to understand whats going on even without opening the app.

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello Ayan, thank you for your feedback. Due to the problem with Xiaomi devices which has caused the app to crash when changing sounds, we had to disable this option. Until Xiaomi fixes this issue in MIUI, you won't be able to do that. Thank you for understanding

comment: Hey guys! Your app is really good, but what makes me really really unhappy is that you dont have track&field (athletics) among the offered sports. That's a real shame. Could you do sth about it? I mean, there are dozen of sports which can be used to bet, but can you make at least one, the track&field, where true fans can just, like the name of the app says, keep score of events????? C'mon!!!! p.s. Oh, yeah, can you make that we decide what part of app opens at startup. For example I would like an option to always see the Favourites bar when I start the app?????

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello there, thank you for your suggestion. We'll consider Athletics in the near future. Favorites tab is just one swipe away so we think this shouldn't be the problem. Best regards

author: Denis Amosi
comment: Hello guys I have been experiencing some difficult to the app. It doesn't show head to head on football teams.  So what's wrong help me please

author: Tino Tino
comment: The best its what I was looking for  a long time everything  in one package but please  in the next update add  a news  feed for every  sport  and please  fix the refresh tab  it takes way to long to update  the game I want to watch cricket game  or football  game  ball by ball

author: tameem nahhas
comment: On new version of app i can not mute notifications of just one favorite match... Old version was no problem   Not : if i mute any followed match i have same problem the notification still receiving ...please solve it

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello Tameem, thank you for your review. Do you experience this problem on followed leagues, teams or you have followed single match? Please contact us at support@sofascore.com and we'll investigate this further. Best regards

author: Vikunth Chandra
comment: One of the best apps I've ever used! Just one thing, start including the scorers(Football/Soccer) in the notifications again.

author: Emre Baş
comment: It works amazingly. It has simple design and best information of players, teams and clubs. I'm saying that I wish there will be football match everyday, right now.

author: Roadie 58
comment: Covers nearly every sport I follow (except Aussie rules football!). Fast, up to date, nearly perfect.. Update - I've just found it does cover Aussie rules, so perfect for me too keep track of my favourite teams and sports..

author: Kristijan Mihajlovski
comment: It's perfect, the only thing bothering me is that when I get a notification about a goal scored, I have to open the app to find out the scorer.

author: James Muriithi
comment: The app is easy to use,  however I would request that on the prediction end you can increase the other options he.  In football you can add GG/No GG,  Over /Under 2.5 . These are the commonly used betting in football,  Also customize the app to allow video streaming.

author: MICHAEL MUTUNGA
comment: Sofa score is best app unow football standing for all ligue for all over the would and we now time standing in the league and we see livescore live in the app  for all ligue 22  +.  she can say now sofascore is number one app in the foot ball livescore and others ,my app whech can trust now for all legue..

author: Jwalin Bhatt
comment: So far the best app I have ever seen for score updates and statistics of Association Football. The goal notifications are so fast that it's actually ahead of the live match on TV. But would even love it if you could also tell who scored in your goal notifications

author: tj pearson
comment: Great app, purchased this to replace 365 subscription as the app tried to tempt me to bet more and more, we're not all gamblers. Love this app as covers loads of sports and allows you to create a profile, only disappointment is not being able to set a dark theme. tj

author: Philip Hodgson
comment: National Conference league table has been blatantly wrong for weeks now. Brings in to question the accuracy of all the stats and information on the site when some as simple as a league table is wrong.

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello Phillip, thank you for your notice. Issue with Wrexham points in the table has been fixed and National Conference table should be correct. Apologies for any inconvenience caused by this. Best regards

author: Phineas Dlamini
comment: Love every minute of it, and thank for Cricket and Formula 1, can we get reminders on the next Formula race and get updates on the drivers and construction team, but one step at a time. Thank you for removing the ads

author: The Shadow2017
comment: Please fix he table for the Rugby union six nations to include bonus points if possible. 1 BP for scoring 4 trys or losing the game by less than 7pts

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello there, thank you for your review. After reviewing your report, we can confirm that standings are updated correctly. We're keeping in mind rule for BPs. Best regards

comment: Amaaaaaazing! Was a long time onefootball user but it doesn't even come close to Sofascore!

author: Ilyéss GASSA
comment: This app is amazing .. all what I have to do is one tap and I will know all match's results and news .. I said all matchs of the whole planet

author: Ahsan Habib
comment: Love You guys.. best app.....improved my betting.....moreover,  you can add some option which could be beneficial for our betting. ☺☺☺...... Love you guys

author: Rupam Sahriar
comment: Very good apps. It give me all information about gamematch. Its rating system is best. I love it. Hope you will enjoy.

author: Darren Corrizon
comment: I love the app. So far it is the best app i have come across apart from the recent update. It brings up a blank page on recent form of the teams kindly fix this bug otherwise its a great app

author: Michael Griffiths
comment: You have just changed your mind on a score 10 times first 1-0 then 0-0 then 0-1 then 0-0 then 1-0 then 2-0 then 1-0 then 2_0 then 3-0 and finally back to 2-0 crazy

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello Michael, thank you for your review. We have noticed a problem on Malaysian match with duplicated push notifications. We apologize for the inconvenience. Best regards

author: Farzaan Khan
comment: I am using this in my smart watch. At the moment it's the best app for wear devices as you can follow 20+ sports through this one app.

author: Edwin Rwengo
comment: It keeps crushing and restarting way too often. Becoming anoying now.

author: David Golubović
comment: You do not have the first Serbian football league and you have "Kosovo"... Shame...

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello David, thank you for your review. Serbian "Superliga" and "Prva Liga" are both available in SofaScore app. Please find it in Leagues - Serbia - Superliga. If you need more help to find them, contact us at support@sofascore.com. Best regards

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Not bad, probably best sports app for Android, but no Formula 1 notifications, no roller hockey, no separate notification sound for goals from your team like FotMob, no sport identification in the notifications, unnecessary notifications when a player plays for a club's A and B teams, futsal goal/finish/start notifications don't work, occasionally inaccurate football team formations / player positions, spams you with unsolicited notification ads, tennis notifications sometimes do nothing when pressed, and developer disregards issues you have, reported, and provided evidence of instead of fixing them.

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello Filipe, thank you for your review. Formula 1 notifications are coming soon, roller hockey is not planned, notifications for your team are also not planned. Some of the issues reported are not true - tennis notifications are working properly, lineups are based on official data. For more response from devs, contact us at support@sofascore.com.

author: Ravi Kini
comment: It crashes a lot. It's an amazing app if it stops crashing!
Quick to confirm scores stats games to watch.dont bet but great little app.

author: Andrej Sunjka
comment: Great app, you have all clubs and leagues. Fast, no ads, I would recommend it to anyone who follows sports. Love it.

author: dolfyn돌핀
comment: recent update slowed down performance and cant see recent form

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello there. We had some issues with our back-end servers during the Sunday afternoon. These issues have been fixed and all the information should be available now. Best regards

author: Esther Chiamaka Okafor
comment: Very useless now Doesn't give notification anymore

reply.author: SofaScore
reply.content: Hello Esther, thank you for your review. To fix the problem with notifications on Samsung devices, please follow these steps: https://www.sofascore.com/news/faqs/notifications-dont-work-samsung-devices/ Best regards

author: Onur
comment: Good but for basketball matches, PIR 's are mostly wrong right after the games.

author: Jibin Mathew
comment: This app is a one of a good app it shows information about all sports ..Thanking you all the authority of this app
This app is really amazing.It reduce live scores fast and correct.Just love it..👌

author: Sherif Elashhab
comment: That friend who knows everything about sports events.
